tourName: Sri Lanka small group local tour
generalInfo:
The 14-day small group holiday has been customized to include both touristy activities and off the beaten track locations.

During your holiday you will visit Negombo, Sigiriya, Kandy, Nuwara Eliya, Yala. Galle and Colombo.

The holiday is designed by Rajiv who has been traveling with tourist for over 20 years. The holiday is designed to include a minimum of two nights at Sigiriya, Kandy, Nuwara Eliya, Yala, and this gives you time to relax and enjoy your holiday.

One key element which must be considered when visiting Sri Lanka is the tropical weather. We have planned this holiday so that you will enjoy bright sunshine and blue skies.

On your arrival in Sri Lanka, you will be met by your local team Gillian and Rajiv. Gillian and Rajiv are passionate about travel, and this makes them the best team to travel with during your holiday.

Gillian an ex-hotelier and banker married to Rajiv will work together to make sure you have an amazing holiday in Sri Lanka with memories for a lifetime.

We have designed this holiday for you from start to end with one key element in mind which is peace of mind.

From the time you confirm your holiday with us we get to work. On your arrival in our little island paradise, we meet you personally and till you leave Sri Lanka you will be pampered with the best of Sri Lankan hospitality.

You will enjoy local food and culture from the start. Gillian and Rajiv are foodies and enjoy entertaining. We have planned many local surprises during your holiday with us.

You will enjoy guided tours of the Sigiriya, Polonnaruwa and Dambulla Cave Temple which are ancient cultural sites.

Kandy which was the last Kingdom in Sri Lanka before the British took full control of the Island. Here you will stay two nights and visit the Temple of the Tooth Relic and also enjoy a relaxed walk at the Royal Botanical Gardens.

You will visit a working tea factor and enjoy a cup of authentic Ceylon tea.

Sri Lanka has an abundance of wildlife and during your holiday you will visit the world famous Yala national park for a full day safari. You will also visit an elephant conservation project called the elephant transit home in Uda Walawe. We have also included a unique boat safari on the Walawe River.

Your holiday includes a total of four nights at the beach. During your beach break you will visit the Galle Fort and Sea Turtle conservation project.

A Colombo city tour and local shopping experience is included for you

All the hotels are locally owned and managed; they are centrally located which gives you the opportunity to explore on your own. Your stay at these hotels' benefits both the locals and Sri Lanka as a country.

All your meals are included in this holiday. Most of our dinners and breakfasts will be at the hotels. Lunch will be at local restaurants and cafes.

You will travel in luxury and comfort in a fully airconditioned vehicle. These vehicles are fully insured and driven by experienced drivers.

WELLCOME TO SRI LANKA MACHANG!
